job_description: Are you enthusiastic about working with data and transforming it into meaningful insights? Are you interested in honing your skills in data engineering and business intelligence? If you have a passion for data-driven decision-making and want to embark on a journey to become a proficient Data Engineer and BI Analyst, we invite you to join our dynamic team for a comprehensive internship/pre-employment training program.About Us:‚ÄØ We are a forward-thinking company dedicated to leveraging data to drive strategic decisions and innovation. We aim to empower businesses with actionable insights derived from structured and unstructured data. By joining us, you'll be part of a team that values creativity, collaboration, and continuous learning.Position Overview:‚ÄØ As a Data Engineering Intern within the BI field, you'll have the unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in data engineering and business intelligence. You'll work with cutting-edge tools and technologies to build, maintain, and optimize data pipelines, databases, and visualizations.This program aims to equip you with the skills needed to excel in data engineering and BI and may lead to a potential full-time role within our organization.What you will learn:Collaborate with the data engineering team to design, build, and maintain pipelines that extract, transform, and load data from various sources into our data warehouseDevelop data integration processes to ensure a seamless data flow across different systemsParticipate in data quality initiatives to ensure data accuracy, consistency, and completenessAssist in performance tuning and optimization of data pipelines to enhance efficiencyWork closely with business stakeholders to understand their data requirements and develop interactive dashboards and reports using BI tools (e.g., Power BI, Fabric)Transform raw data into insightful visualizations that provide actionable insights for decision-makingCollaborate with the data engineering team to ensure that data is available, accurate, and well-structured for BI reportingParticipate in user training sessions to promote self-service analytics within the organizationWhat are the strengths you will acquire:Get knowledge and experience that will prepare you for the top Microsoft certifications related to data analytics that will consolidate your careerGet hands-on, 360-degree experience on projects with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and provide data-driven solutionsBecome fully equipped for a high-demand job and learn how the BI industry shapes the data landscape across the globeQualifications:Pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Business Information Systems, or a related fieldBasic understanding of databases, data modeling, and SQLFamiliarity with programming languages such as PythonInterest in data visualization and familiarity with BI tools (Power BI, Fabric, etc.)Strong analytical mindset and problem-solving skillsEffective communication and teamwork abilitiesEagerness to learn and adapt to new technologies and methodologiesBenefits:Hands-on experience working on data projectsMentorship and guidance from experienced data professionalsExposure to a variety of data tools and technologiesPotential for a full-time position upon successful completion of the internship/trainingEmbark on a journey to become a skilled Data Engineer and BI Analyst.Apply now to kickstart your career in the world of data-driven decision-making!

Hey, you! üëãDo you want to be part of a team where we focus on a positive working environment in a dynamic workplace, that it has both a complex and with an easy-going vibe? Do you want your work to have a direct impact for the people around you, while working for Romania‚Äôs biggest bank, a product and people-oriented company?If so, come and become one of the #peopleOfBT. Come meet us and we will tell you more about what this meansüë©‚ÄçüíªResponsibilities:Actively work on our development projects, making use of the BigData ecosystem toolsData discovery and data analyticsPreparing intuitive data visualization that tell the story of the processed dataPrepare proper deployment pipelines using CI/CDWork with the devops and infrastructure teams to define and maintain the working environmentsActively research on the latest technologies Technology stack:The ideal candidate should have experience with most of the following technologies, with a focus on BigData:ScalaHadoopSparkKafkaNiFiMongoLinuxDockerJenkinsSQLNice to have:DruidSupersetSnowflakeBigData cluster managementEach project will have its particularities and we will have to adapt so that we can support the development lifecycle following the industry‚Äôs best practicesü§ù

We have openings for recent graduates in our global team of HR Generalists, one in each major region of the world. We are holding these positions for truly exceptional individuals who will graduate from their first undergraduate degree in the next year, or who have graduated in the last six months at the time of application. We will assess candidates on the basis of academic achievement and extramural leadership. Candidates will need to show a track record at school and university of consistent over-achievement as well as evidence of a desire and ability to learn, drive and shape HR practices on the global stage in a rapidly changing world.Our people are based in more than 70 countries around the world. Our HR department depends on the precise application of policy and process as well as a depth of compliance and People partnering to make us an efficient, friendly, quality-driven, real-time service. The Associate HR Generalist will be responsible for supporting and coordinating general HR activities supporting our AMER, EMEA and APAC regions and driving our HR processes. This is a great opportunity to start and progress your career in a People function supporting team members worldwide.The successful candidate will bring an exceptional academic track record coupled with some experience working in an entry-level role in an HR or People Team. You will bring some existing knowledge of employment law. Ideally, we are looking for someone who has an inherent interest in the Technology sector, specifically Open Source.Location: These roles can be held in any time zone. We have HR teams for EMEA, APAC and the Americas.What your day will look likeProvide HR support by answering team members' questions and responding to requests regarding their employment and contracts, escalating when necessary. Requests may include information about the new starter process and onboarding, questions regarding global benefits, employment verifications, and other general inquiries. Maintain our HRIS, ensuring a high degree of accuracy and timeliness in processing all team member changes and new joiners. Owning global projects (e.g. engagement, training or culture initiatives)Partnering with the managers and employees - supporting HR processes and driving the people strategy for your areas of responsibilityWorking as a truly global partner to colleagues, especially leads, managers and executivesProcess new hires, including country-specific on-boarding documentation, creation of files, systems set-up, and coordination of introductory reviews. Provide support to employees for the enrollment and processing of benefits and the payroll process, ensuring monthly data is provided on time and is accurate. Liaise with payroll to guarantee smooth salary payments. Create purchase orders for internal departments. Provide administrative support to employees for the enrollment and processing of benefits. Conduct regular audits of employment files and systems to ensure they are up-to-date, accurate, and GDPR compliant. Continually work to better our processes, spotting areas we can improve to drive our function forward. Conduct and manage global background checks. What we are looking for in youAn exceptional academic track record from both high school and preferably universityExperience working in an entry-level role in an HR/People team is beneficial, preferably in the Technology industry. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Able to prioritize complex workloads, manage time effectively and work well under pressure. Self-motivated and results-orientated with a clear focus on accuracy. High level of honesty, integrity, and ability to handle confidential data. Flexible attitude and easily adaptable to change. Willing to take the initiative and provide suggestions and ideas to contribute to the success of the role/team. Ambitious to grow your career within HR. Willingness to travel up to 4 times a year for internal eventsWhat we offer youWe consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus which varies based on seniority but starts at a range up to 10%. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to ensure fairness globally.Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person - we've been working remotely since 2004!Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per yearAnnual compensation reviewRecognition rewardsAnnual holiday leaveMaternity and paternity leaveEmployee Assistance ProgrammeOpportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues from your team and othersPriority Pass for travel and travel upgrades for long haul company eventsAbout CanonicalCanonical is a pioneering tech firm that is at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world on a daily basis. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do.Canonical has been a remote-first company since its inception in 2004. Work at Canonical is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game. Canonical provides a unique window into the world of 21st-century digital business.Canonical is an equal opportunity employerWe are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Cybersecurity Specialist to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for protecting our company's networks, computer systems, and data from cyber threats. This individual will work closely with the IT team to identify potential vulnerabilities and implement security measures to safeguard against cyber attacks.Responsibilities:Monitor computer networks and systems for security breaches and investigate incidents when they occur.Implement and maintain security measures such as firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and encryption protocols.Develop and implement security policies and procedures to ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations.Conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments to identify potential risks and weaknesses.Keep up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in cybersecurity to stay ahead of potential threats.Respond to security incidents in a timely manner and provide recommendations for remediation.Work closely with the IT team to ensure that all systems and applications are up-to-date with the latest security patches and updates.Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field or security certificates.Minimum of 3 years of experience in cybersecurity or related field.Experience with security tools and technologies such as firewalls, intrusion detection systems, encryption protocols and Cloud.Knowledge of industry standards and regulations such as HIPAA, PCI-DSS, and GDPR.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.Ability to work independently and as part of a team.Preferred Qualifications:Professional certifications such as Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) or CompTIA Security+.Experience with cloud-based security solutions.Knowledge of scripting languages such as Python or PowerShell.Microsoft Defender would be a plus.Bit Defender would also be a plus.If you are passionate about cybersecurity and have a strong desire to protect our company's networks and data from cyber threats, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.Powered by JazzHRkuYfBSulnQ

Ce facem noi pentru tine?Everything we develop in PROFI is possible thanks to the contribution of each one of us.Our values, born from how we are and behave every day, are the basic commitments of our company and reflect how we relate to those around us.We know that the learning process is continuous and we are glad that in Profi we have all the opportunities and open perspectives for DEVELOPMENT.We share ideas, develop initiatives and support each other because team performance is easier to achieve through COOPERATION.We know the company‚Äôs vision and what others expect from us, and we strengthen our professional relationships with honesty and TRANSPARENCY.We are looking for kind and involved people, who want to perform with us, we are more thancolleagues from Profi, the largest employer in the private sector in Romania.We, #OameniiDeLaprofi, are always united by the ambition to take the company to the next level together.DacƒÉ Ai`-Education: A bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs degree in Computer science, Information Systems, or another related field is usually required.Communication Skills: Strong communication and interpersonal skills are essential, as you will be working closely with business stakeholders and technical teams to implement data management and reporting solutions. Able to demonstrate capability to ‚Äòtell stories‚Äô with Data!Leadership Skills: Strong leadership skills are necessary to recruit and manage a team of data analysts and other staff responsible for data management and reporting.Analytical Skills: Strong analytical skills are necessary to analyze data and identify trends and insights that can inform business decisions.Problem-Solving Skills: Strong problem-solving skills are necessary to identify and resolve data management issues and to develop innovative solutions to complex business.Technical Skills: Strong technical skills in data management, data warehousing, business intelligence, analytics, and reporting are essential. Experience with ETL tools, SQL, and BI platforms such as Tableau, Power BI, or Qlik is usually required.Design and implementation of KPIs for both the Business and the Data function!Industry Experience: Retail industry experience is highly desirable, as it allows you to understand the unique data needs of a retail enterprise. Experience with point-of-sale systems, inventory management systems, and customer relationship management systems is also highly desirable.Ce vei face tu pentru noi?`-Analytics and Business Intelligence Strategy: You will be responsible for developing and implementing a business intelligence strategy that aligns with the company‚Äôs overall strategic objectives. This includes identifying opportunities for using data and analytics to improve business processes, reduce costs, and increase revenue.Data Management and Governance: you will be responsible for managing the company‚Äôs data assets, including data quality, data governance, data architecture, data modeling, and data security. You will define data standards, policies, and procedures to ensure that the company‚Äôs data is accurate and consistent across all systems. You will need to work closely with business teams to ensure they effectively manage and maintain good data quality and governance.Reporting and Analytics: You will be responsible for developing and managing the company‚Äôs reporting and analytics capabilities. This includes designing and implementing reporting and analytics solutions, such as dashboards, scorecards, and ad-hoc reports, to support business decision-making.Data Integration: You will be responsible for integrating data from various sources, such as point-of-sale systems, inventory management systems, and customer relationship management systems, into a centralized data warehouse. This involves designing and implementing data integration solutions that enable data to be extracted, transformed, and loaded into the data warehouse.Team Building: Up to now Profi has relied on third parties to deliver key Data capabilities. You will be responsible for working with them, but also building the team that allows us to bring this capability in house.

We're looking for a dedicated Data Analyst to be part of our Resident Screening Analytics team. Since 2010, Yardi Resident Screening has been focused on providing our clients with insightful analysis regarding their applicant pool and resident performance.As a part of our YRS Analytics team, you will work together with colleagues and supervisors on assigned projects to make sure internal management and client needs are met. You will be using statistical and visual analysis tools, and gathering and interpreting data, in order to offer clients a complex overview of applicant trends.This role implies both on-site and remote work, so please consider that you may occasionally be called to work from the Cluj office.What We're Looking ForBachelor's degree or higher in statistics, mathematics, or other related fields;Strong Microsoft Excel skills;+Statistical Analysis;+Data Mining;+Past experience in successfully handling projects that require accuracy and close attention to detail (preferably projects that involved large amounts of data within spreadsheet and database programs);+Ability to meet critical deadlines and prioritize multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment;+Strong attention to detail;+Independent decision-making and problem-solving skills;Effective communication skills in English, both written and spoken;+Ability to think analytically and effectively communicate analysis to others.It Is Considered a Plus+Database experience;+Experience with statistical or analytical tools;+Experience in using CRM.What You'll Do+Execute special data projects using statistical and visual analysis tools;+Gather and analyze data from various sources to determine and report on key observations, conclusions and trends;+Produce attractive charts, graphs and reports to communicate data findings to end users;+Analyze industry trends and incorporate industry data into analysis;+Present actionable information to optimize business decisions;+Research on market conditions and industry trends to incorporate into data sets;+Document processes as needed contributing to the analytics knowledge base;Make suggestions for improvements and additional value-added data projects.We Also Offer a Competitive Benefits Package IncludingHighly competitive salary;Up to two thousand USD educational reimbursement plan/calendar year;Comprehensive private medical and life insurance plan;Flexible work schedule;Modern technology, work methods and tools;Possibility to participate in various training programs and conferences;Thirty RON/day meal tickets;Frequent internal engagement activities, themed parties & team-buildings;Discount plans for fitness centers, restaurants and various service providers;Fresh fruit, snacks and coffee in the office;Open air terraces, game rooms.Company DetailsYardi Romania is part of Yardi Systems, Inc., an American company founded in 1984 that has become the leading provider of software solutions for the real estate industry, with over 45 offices and 8000+ employees worldwide. Our development center in Cluj-Napoca, opened in 2010, is the second largest Yardi office in the world ‚Äì counting over 1,200 dedicated professionals with highly diverse skillsets, ranging from software development to data research and analysis, marketing, journalism, consulting, and customer service.Our success belongs to our employees, who make Yardi Romania an amazing place to work and grow.

job_title: HR Admin Assistant - CLUJ, remote work model
job_description: Our client is seeking a passionate HR professional, a dynamic individual that pays attention to details and has advanced multitasking skills, that will have the role of HR Assistant.      HR Assistant      The HR Assistant is responsible for supporting the HR function by maintaining all HR data and providing related analytics, as well as various other HR tasks. We are seeking a talented HR Assistant to join our dynamic team. If you're a creative problem solver, always seeking to develop and grow in the current role, a master when it comes to time management, and a real team player, this opportunity is perfect for you.       Key Responsibilities:    1.       Onboarding and Orientation:        Play a key role in welcoming new hires in the organization, offering support in all the dedicated onboarding activities of new employees (prepare onboarding, fix meetings, assist managers in welcoming new employees)          Track employee progress within the onboarding program (IT form, check list‚Ä¶), ensuring a smooth integration into the company‚Äôs culture and value         Create dedicated reports       2.       HR Administration:        Play a part in an international organization, offering support for the daily operations of HR team (International)         Use HR databases to review, input and keep track of employee information         Maintain organized, complete and up-to-date HR files in the ADP system         Maintain the ESS absence system accurate for all countries in Europe      3. Employee Relations:        Provide support in resolving employee queries, offer information regarding the HR processes          Be a point of contact for employees, have excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to communicate effectively at all levels of the organization      Your profile:         Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Human Resources or relevant fields         Minimum of 2-3 years' work experience in a similar role         A proven track recording of executing HR-related tasks         Hands on experience working with MS Office, and HR software / Database management         Effective oral and written communication skills in English, any other foreign language is a plus         High ethical standards and ability to exhibit a high level of confidentiality         Natural multitasker who can handle competing priorities and deadlines with ease         Attention to details, ability to accurately maintain data in the HR systems         Thrive in a team-oriented environment and actively contribute to the success of the HR team and the organization         Availability to travel        We are happy to consider applications from all candidates who are able to demonstrate the skills necessary to fulfill the role. We can only answer to the best-fit applicants. The rest of the CVs are stored in our international talent pool for potential future matches. Please note that your personal information will be treated in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Thank you!    By applying to this job, you give your written consent and agreement to Antal Romania/ Cluj-Napoca Office to keep your CV in our systems and to send it to our clients for evaluation as a candidate for the available positions in their organizations.    You are informed that your data will be kept according to Antal's Privacy Policy (https://www.antal.com/privacy).

Emerging Travel Group, world leader in online travel services, a travel-tech company that owns several international brands: RateHawk, ZenHotels, RoundTrip, and others.12 years ago we exploded into the travel industry with an innovative B2B hotel booking engine. Today we have representatives in more than 40 countries around the world, giving our clients the ability to book travel services in any country.We are looking for an experienced Sales Manager in Romania to join our international B2B brand RateHawk, develop our business and make the travel world better together!Job ResponsibilitiesActively promote our international project in assigned territory;Develop and implement sales activities and hit the sales targets to achieve growth and expand presence in assigned territory;Sign-up new partners and provide them with extended training of our system;Initiate an API deals with the potential and existing partners;Build and maintain a strong, long-lasting relationship with new partners;Prepare, execute, and manage the commercial deals with the partners including the execution of required document flow and technical setup;Account clients until the first purchase is made;Control of compliance with commercial conditions by partners including the payment flow;Provide market & competitive environment analysis;Provide comprehensive reportingRequirements Relevant experience. Ideally, 2-5 years experience in the travel industry and excellent knowledge of the country`s travel market; specialized in sales management or business development of B2B travel companies;Competence in API technology deals; Personal skills. Proactive, ambitious, motivated, action-oriented, results-focused, appetite for innovative technology, comfortable with fast-changing business environment, teamplayer; Analytical skills. Used to data-driven decision-making, metrics-driven and good with numbers; International mindset. Ability to understand and work across a wide range of cultural contexts reflecting ETG‚Äôs global presence; Language knowledge. Fluent in Romanian and English, other languages as a plus; Readiness for business trips. 30 ‚Äì 40% of working time might be required for market visitsBenefitsCompetitive salary;Career growth opportunities and a corporate culture that encourages professional development;Complex and innovative product;Young and ambitious team of professionals;Learning: seminars, trainings and conferences. If you want to participate in a conference, we will help to organize it;Remote work format and a flexible timetable ‚Äî we don‚Äôt require you to be online or in the office at 09:00 sharp. You can start work at a time that suits you;Corporate discounts on hotels and other services

job_title: Graphic Designer keen on data (a.k.a. classic with a twist)
job_description: The classics: This position represents a great opportunity to get introduced to the highly competitive North American online marketing industry. Our dynamic marketing team in Cluj-Napoca, already counting over 120 professionals, is looking for a graphic professional to join them in taking on the real estate industry. Friendly, professional and fun are just some of the words people use to describe the work environment in the marketing team at Yardi.The twist: Out here, in the realm of marketing, we're good at what we do and we do wonders, but we need a graphic wizard to help us get our projects seen‚Ä¶ and ok, reach their goal too (amaze or just convert, emphasize or just distract, convince or just impress, get the ok or get an honest wow!).The road from idea to goal is never straight. You and the team would have to cruise through the roads of great ideas and take things from A to an outstanding B. Up for the challenge?This role implies both on-site and remote work, so please consider that you may occasionally be called to work from the Cluj office.The ClassicsDesired skills and experience:2years of relevant work experience;A very good sense of colour, proportion and layout;Very good knowledge of graphic and multimedia software and applications such as Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, Premier);Ability to transform the strategic intent into compelling design concepts;Ability to multitask and shift focus from one project to another;A high level of attention to detail;Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work in a cross-functional team;Good English skills.The TwistIf you can work on multiple assignments with good planning of your time and priorities, you're it.If you can understand structure, analyze data and put it in a comprehensive chart, you're even better.If you can challenge existing methodologies and identify alternative solutions, you're the best.If you've worked with data visualization tools like Infogram or Tableau, or any other for that matter, where have you been all our lives?ResponsibilitiesThe classics:Designing eye-catching PR materials based on in-house market reports;Suggesting new ideas for graphic output for the project;Being part of the project's artistic direction;Collaborating with all marketing specialists to deliver high quality creative material (concept to completion) that meet the objective;Maintaining overall consistency in graphic appearance according to the brand's standards and guidelines;Designing digital marketing materials and marketing collateral in collaboration with our marketing specialists (ads, banners, landing pages).The TwistWe need a passionate artist who understands that seeing every little bit of a project will make him/her create the best visual representation and only that very best outcome can bring the best results.Think of it like this: we have a full suite of digital marketers, from content creators to communications specialists, from analysts to email marketers, from search engine optimization experts to paid advertising specialists. They all need a designer's eye (and brain, and opinion and skill).Mandatory task: Please submit your portfolio through the application form or include a link on your resume.We Also Offer a Competitive Benefits Package IncludingHighly competitive salary;Up to two thousand dollars educational reimbursement plan/calendar year;Comprehensive private medical and life insurance plan;Flexible office work schedule;Modern technology, work methods and tools;Possibility to participate in various training programs and conferences;Thirty RON/day meal tickets;Frequent internal engagement activities, themed parties & team-buildings.Discount plans for fitness centers, restaurants, and various other service providers;Fresh fruit, snacks and coffee in the office;Open air terraces, game rooms.Company DetailsYardi Romania is part of Yardi Systems, Inc., an American company founded in 1984 that has become the leading provider of software solutions for the real estate industry, with over 45 offices and 8000+ employees worldwide. Our development center in Cluj-Napoca, opened in, is the second largest Yardi office in the world ‚Äì counting over 1200 dedicated professionals with highly diverse skillsets, ranging from software development to data research and analysis, marketing, journalism, consulting, and customer service.Our success belongs to our employees, who make Yardi Romania an amazing place to work and grow.

Starting salary of‚ÄØ60,000 USD per annum‚ÄØin a zero-tax environment.Fast progression for strong performers.Job location:‚ÄØDubai, UAEAbout us:Cobblestone Energy is a proprietary trading firm that specializes in the wholesale electricity market across Europe. Electricity is fundamental to the world's economic activities. We trade enough electricity every day to power a small country, and in doing so, we help to address the mismatch between electricity generation and consumption.Job Description‚ÄØAt Cobblestone Energy we are on a mission to build the most advanced European electricity trading and analytics platform, with our technology being used by our teams of commercial traders to create significant value. We are looking for enthusiastic and resourceful developers who are passionate about building exceptionally reliable and performance‚ÄØdata processing solutions. You want to help the commercial team make data-informed decisions, have a curious mindset, and are motivated to understand our business better. Developing a strong domain knowledge of our industry over time is key to long term success in this role.‚ÄØIf you have excellent programming skills, strong problem-solving skills, and a passion for developing and improving applications utilizing cutting edge technologies, then we would like to meet you.‚ÄØWhat we offer in this role‚ÄØCompetitive remuneration, with fast progression for strong performers. A challenging but exciting, open, and fun work environment. An opportunity to work with remarkably talented colleagues. Vast growth potential in every aspect. 15% target bonus with further upside. Employee share scheme participation International relocation support Opportunity to be embedded within a commercial team for those with strong commercial interest Responsibilities‚ÄØWrite software applications and programs for backend/frontend purposes.‚ÄØ Analyse programs and apps to improve their features and functionalities.‚ÄØ Test & debug programs and fix any reported bugs.‚ÄØ Collaborate with the tech team to improve the performance, efficiency, and scalability of our tools.‚ÄØ Requirements‚ÄØBS/BE in Computer Science/Computer Engineering.‚ÄØ Programming experience of 1 to 2 years in Python language.‚ÄØ Expertise in at least one popular Python framework (like Django, Flask ...).‚ÄØ Experience of 1 to 2 years in front-end technologies such as HTML5, CSS,‚ÄØJQuery, JS, ...etc.‚ÄØ Knowledge of APIs and webservices.‚ÄØ Knowledge of Relational Databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server ...) and SQL language.‚ÄØ Knowledge of NoSQL databases is a plus.‚ÄØ Knowledge of AWS is a plus / Knowledge of data visualization tools, mainly Tableau, is a plus.‚ÄØ Ability to work in a team environment.‚ÄØ Strong problem-solving skills and analytical skills.‚ÄØ Resilience and a determination to‚ÄØsucceed.‚ÄØ Independent thinkers with growth mindset.‚ÄØ Must be‚ÄØpassionate,‚ÄØself-motivated,‚ÄØand able to learn quickly.‚ÄØ Strong sense of integrity.‚ÄØ‚ÄØ Personal values that match our company values.‚ÄØ

At SWATI, we celebrate style and beauty in all its forms. Not only do we provide our customers with exceptional beauty solutions, but we encourage people to express who they are. Who we are:Tractable is an Artificial Intelligence company bringing the speed and insight of Applied AI to visual assessment. ABOUT USFood waste is a $1 trillion problem - costing the world over 1% of global GDP. We're dead set on solving the problem and looking for people to help us achieve our mission. We, at Winnow, believe that food is far too valuable to waste, and that technology can transform the way we produce food. Our team is made of people who all share a passion for food and technology.Winnow was founded in London in 2013 to help the hospitality industry prevent food waste through internet of things tools in the kitchen. We have worked with hundreds of sites and are operating in over 25 countries around the world supported by our offices in London, Dubai, Shanghai and Singapore. We are a rapidly growing company with a strong base of clients who are rolling out our system globally. We have blue-chip customers including Accor Hotels, IKEA, IHG, Marriott, Compass Group and many others.As the global leader in addressing food waste, we are committed to continue pushing the envelope on what technology can do to solve this problem. Winnow Vision, our new artificial intelligence-based technology, is trained to automatically track all food waste thrown away. It has won awards at the World Economic Forum and has been received tremendous enthusiasm from our clients and the industry. You can read more about it on our website and this article in Forbes.Other recent accolades saw Winnow awarded a winner of Impact 50's most impactful companies to work for. You can read more about it here.We are passionate about living our values and place them at the centre of everything we do.THE ROLEAbout the teamThe Data team plays a critical role in the continuous improvement of our flagship product - Winnow Vision. We've collected millions of images of food items already, and keep collecting thousands every day from the kitchens we operate in. Those images need to be processed, curated and structured to optimise the quality and accuracy of our AI models. Managing this big data pipeline is no easy task: we operate across the world, in a wide variety of industries and our model needs to recognize food ranging from the Malay Nasi Goreng to the American fried chicken, and everything else in between.We have come a long way - from long data collection time and training small AI models for very specific clients, we have now managed to generalise our approach and can now deploy AI models to almost any kitchen in the world in a matter of a couple of weeks. However, there are still many challenges ahead - today we present a top selection of items to our clients and they confirm the right one - our ambition is to become completely touchless. How can we make our models more confident and more accurate, that is the question!The Data & Machine Learning team consists of 7 people (2 in Cluj and 5 in London) and is expected to continue to grow in the coming months. Roles currently range from data operation to data science.We are investing in developing new products and services, and this role is responsible for supporting data analysis for these innovations. About the role:As a Data Scientist, you will be reporting to the Data Science Lead and will have a wide range of responsibilities which includes: Use your data skills to enhance the confidence and accuracy for our AI models Developing and refining complex queries and reports to help other team members execute their roles Performing ongoing data analysis to present back insights to clients Shape our data      processes to optimize efficiency while reducing costs Imagine and deliver      insightful analysis aiming at improving our user experience Monitor and manage      the existing fleet of models in the field, and ensure new clients benefit      from AI no less than 1 month after installation Produce and track key performance indicators Take on more complex data analysis problems RequirementsExcellent numerical and analytical skills Solid knowledge in SQL, Python (pandas library particularly) required, with a willingness to learn more Experience with data formatting and cleaning, both for numeric and qualitative data Experience handling large datasets from 1,000s to 100,000s of rows Experience visualising large datasets Experience with Mode Analytics, JupyterHub, postgreSQL is a plus A willingness to learn and suggest machine learning approaches to solving data problems  Effective verbal and written communication skills Ability to adapt communication style to suit different audiences  Ability to facilitate group discussions Attention to detail. Ability to develop accurate written materials Action oriented. Ability to follow-up on feedback to ensure positive outcomes Ability to turn data into insights and present these insights effectively  Pro-active and critical thinker Ability to think out of the box and not afraid to speak up Ability to create new processes from scratch Ability to influence others to follow best practices Flexible and willing to take on new challenges as they emerge Benefits Competitive base salary Life insurance Company part-funded health insurance Meal tickets - 35 Ron per working day 2 Wellness hours per month, plus a 274 RON gross monthly wellness allowance Employee Assistance Programme - 24/7 helpline for your wellbeing 25 days of paid vacation time in addition to national holidays You will love what you do - waking up every day solving one of the biggest social problems of our generation Committed team members with broad experience who share a common passion to build a world class business

Employment type: Full-time & PermanentStarting salary of USD 60,000 per annum - 0% tax environmentJob Location: Dubai, UAE (We provide visa sponsorship & relocation assistance)About Cobblestone EnergyCobblestone Energy is an energy trading company specialising in the Great Britain and European wholesale electricity markets. Founded in 2017, we are part of the next generation of companies defining the future of global commodity trading.We make use of advanced data analytics and extensive research to drive profitable decision making, trading enough electricity every day to power a small country, and growing every day. In doing so, we help to balance the electricity grid, lowering the cost to end consumers, and aiding the transition to a renewable future. Technology and risk management form the backbone of our business.At Cobblestone Energy, we are a diverse team of over 50 people from 20+ nationalities - we believe in hiring extraordinary talent from all around the world. Our flat organizational structure helps us in giving our team members complete ownership of the work and ensures ideas come from every level. However, we welcome applicants from all backgrounds and experiences with a track record of excellence, both inside and outside of academics.The Hiring ProcessAfter your application is evaluated, assessments will include psychometric tests, a trading simulation, research project and remote interviews. All the finalists will then be invited for final round of the recruitment process which is a one-week training program, the Commercial Training Program (CTP), at our Dubai office. We will cater for all relocation costs, including flights, tickets, accommodation, work visa paperwork, and related expenses. Those who pass the CTP will be offered a full-time role at Cobblestone Energy and join our 7-12 month long Commercial Development Programme (CDP).The CDP is a well-structured rotational programme giving you exposure to both trading and analytics. In the CDP, you will work alongside our seasoned commercial team members, who will mentor you on the market fundamentals to help you develop potent trading and analytical skills.

At Siena, we are building the world's first autonomous customer service platform, leveraging artificial intelligence to enable machines to engage in useful and empathic conversations. Our platform is the first of its kind, designed to work out-of-the-box to effectively solve customer problems across all digital channels.Our self-service, autonomous CX platform uses advanced natural language processing techniques to communicate with customers in a natural tone and promptly answer questions, while also utilizing conversation redirecting algorithms to develop a human + AI operating model. As a result, companies see a significant reduction in ticket backlogs, a marked improvement in customer experience, improved ability to manage unpredictable conversation volumes, and an increase in agent capacity to handle high empathy cases.If you're excited about artificial intelligence and the intersection of human-to-machine communications, and want to be part of a remote team who is driving innovation and making a real impact, then come join us in pushing the boundaries of AI and CX performance.Team and CultureHere are some of our core values to give you a sense of who we are as a team:Ownership. We build, we celebrate and we take responsibility even when things don't pan out. Set the pace. We move fast, take risks, and chase big outcomes wherever possible. We‚Äôre creating an environment where we can act fearlessly, a consensus isn‚Äôt needed for every action, and experimentation and failure (plus learning) are key. Autonomy. We unblock ourselves, focus on solutions and work towards our goals. Honor execution. Fewer meetings, less of the stuff things that don't make an impact, more action. Move fast and focus on execution instead of talking. Continuous feedback. We are open to feedback and make a habit of sharing feedback with others. Writing > talking. We‚Äôre creating a culture where people can do their best critical thinking and use data to solve problems. What you'll be working onAs an Executive Assistant, you will support our founder and CEO. Your responsibilities will include involvement in all aspects of our startup and its day-to-day operations. This is the perfect position for one with a strong interest in learning entrepreneurship and leadership beyond an assistant role.Manage and maintain the CEO's complex calendar, including scheduling meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements. Reply to emails, send follow-ups and create internal and external communications. Conduct research and prepare reports, memos, and other documents as required. Manage travel & expenses. Organize events, including team meetings, conferences, and webinars. Help support with payroll, accounting, and reporting. Coordinate and prepare materials for meetings, investor updates, memos, conferences, and presentations. Organize and prioritize incoming correspondence, including email, phone calls, and messages. Liaise with internal and external stakeholders, ensuring efficient communication and collaboration. Assist with special projects and initiatives as needed. Handle sensitive and confidential information with discretion. What are the requirements?At least 2 years of experience as an executive assistant or similar role, preferably supporting C-level executives. Exceptional organizational and time management skills, with the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities simultaneously. Strong written and verbal communication skills, with a high level of professionalism and discretion. Experience with calendar management, travel arrangements, and meeting coordination. Ability to work independently, remotely, and adapt to rapidly changing priorities. Proactive problem-solving skills, with keen attention to detail. Demonstrated success in a fast-paced, dynamic work environment. Internet connection: 10 Mbps minimumWillingness to work full-time (40 hours/week) at a time that suits your client (often PH evenings)Proficiency in Google Suite (Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Docs, Sheets, Forms, Slides) and productivity and project management tools/appsA charismatic can-do attitudeWho are we looking for?We have intentionally set a very high standard for our employees and our culture is also of a high standard of performance (but so is our fun facto!).To qualify for the position: In the application section below under What else do you want to share with us? please add the key phrase: "We only have one Earth. We are looking for a Junior Programmer with a passion for SQL to join our local Technical Cases team.As a member of our team, you will provide excellent service to our global and European clients through the resolution of complex data issues and the development of client-specific solutions within Yardi's web-based Voyager ERP software product.Our main goal is to support non-technical teams with the more complex issues (we call them cases) reported by clients. Anything that involves a deeper look into the database, and data fixes, from the most common and simple ones like updating the date of a transaction to more complex ones like creating stored procedures, and functions, improving performance, small adjustments to existing custom reports, etc., can be assigned to our team to review and identify the best solution.As you're only getting started, you'll have a mentor who will guide, advise, and coach you, and you'll also benefit from your colleagues' help and collaboration.This position is available in a hybrid regime that implies working from the office on a weekly basis.What We're Looking ForTop university student or graduate, with a degree in Economic Informatics or Computer Science;Strong knowledge of SQL;Good English skills;Solid programming skills;Very strong analytical skills;Excellent organizational skills;Ability to work independently and as part of a team.What You'll DoUnderstand the functionalities of the business requirements and processes to develop custom solutions;Develop custom reports and functionalities that match client-specific needs using the appropriate tools;Test custom reports and functionalities.We Also Offer a Competitive Benefits Package IncludingHighly competitive salary;Up to two thousand USD educational reimbursement plan/calendar year;Comprehensive private medical and terraces, game rooms;Company detailsYardi Romania is part of Yardi Systems, Inc., an American company founded in 1984 that has become the leading provider of software solutions for the real estate industry, with over 45 offices and 8000+ employees worldwide.
